name: The Greatest Survival
description:
The sequel to a series that noone wanted - but with a lot of actual effort put in!

When her father disappears, Lyza follows in his footsteps to find him. On her way she'll encounter charging grandmas, snowmen fighting their concept of capitalism, an ogre that can't keep his allergies in check and much, much more.

Features:

  • Over 400 achievements just waiting to be unlocked!
  • A game specifically designed with speedrunning in mind! Figure out the best routes and strategies to reach the end the fastest and share it with the community!
  • An active, for RPG Maker rather unconventional, battle system - spells affect the map itself and can speed up Lyza or even freeze time itself.
  • A myriad of ways to customise Lyza with various weapons and armor, creating your own playstyle.
  • Infinitely* Humorous
    • *Until the game ends**
    • **Well, okay, at least there *is* humor!
  • A rollercoaster of emotions - what starts out as a fun adventure is soon discarded for a serious twist towards the end.
  • A spoiler-free feature list.  (Dang it. We'll get 'em next time!)

The Greatest Survival is a sequel to the "The Great Survival" trilogy's more than humble beginnings, but with a lot of effort put in to make the best of something that was without a doubt terrible. Content-wise it has expanded a lot as well - this game alone is four times bigger than the entire trilogy as a whole!

Hint: It is NOT required to have played the previous three games (69105) to understand this one, as it would count as some sort of modern torture method and would land me in jail.

F5 switches to fullscreen, F6 changes the size of the window.
